ref.title: Thermodynamic and transport properties of 1-allyl-3-methylimidazolium bis(trifluromethylsulfonyl)imide + 1-propanol liquid mixtures: A Molecular Dynamics study
ref.full: Blanco-Diaz, E.G.; Castrejon-Gonzalez, E.O.; Lopez-Cortes, I.Y.; Ramos-Estrada, M.; Iglesias-Silva, G.A. (2019) J. Mol. Liq. 279, 662-668.
